comments.body: Not sure if these flags are still needed now that I am using conda's `gcc`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +5,9 @@    export FFLAGS="-static -ff2c -arch x86_64"
    export LDFLAGS="-Wall -undefined dynamic_lookup -bundle -arch x86_64"
    export LDFLAGS="-Wl,-search_paths_first -L$(pwd) $LDFLAGS"
fi
